    • Constructor Detail

      • Item

        public Item(java.lang.String name,
            java.awt.Color color)
        Creates an Item with a specific name and item. The name should correspond to an image file at images/[name].png
        Parameters:
        name - the name of this Item
        color - the Color of this Item to display in the minimap
